vote.title: An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 32800 ordering a special election to be held in the City of Dallas on Tuesday, November 5, 2024, for the purpose of submitting to the qualified voters of the City three proposed amendments to the Dallas City Charter, submitted by Dallas HERO Initiative in accordance with Section 9.004(a) of the Texas Local Government Code, in anticipation of a potential court ruling - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
vote.description: An ordinance amending Ordinance No. 32800 ordering a special election to be held in the City of Dallas on Tuesday, November 5, 2024, for the purpose of submitting to the qualified voters of the City three proposed amendments to the Dallas City Charter, submitted by Dallas HERO Initiative in accordance with Section 9.004(a) of the Texas Local Government Code, in anticipation of a potential court ruling - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
